content.question: The labor patterns shown in the table are most directly relevant in understanding which broader process in nineteenth-century Europe?

choices.label: The emergence of challenges to patriarchal gender norms
The decline in the popularity of organized religions
The development of new class identities
The growing influence of nationalism on state policy

content.answer: The development of new class identities

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
